alert.note: Alert for Portage (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 4:05PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms with gusty winds will impact portions of Portage, Stark and eastern Summit Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 404 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Wadsworth to New Philadelphia. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. Additional showers and storms with strong winds may move through from the west in about an hour. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Akron, Canton, Ravenna, Cuyahoga Falls, Massillon, Kent, Green, Alliance, Hudson, Twinsburg, Tallmadge, North Canton, Streetsboro, Macedonia, Louisville, Mogadore, Minerva, Hartville, Navarre and Mantua. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
